title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 102.2 - Restrictions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 102.2 - Restrictions

State Regulations

No person shall: (a) hunt or trap on the area, except by
written permission of the Department of Environmental Conservation
(department); (b) operate a boat on
the area without permission of the department; (c) operate any motorized vehicle on the
area; (d) take unleashed pets on
the area; (e) erect any structures
without permission of the department; (f) possess alcoholic beverages while on the
area; (g) conduct a picnic, athletic event, or outing by a group or organization in excess of 25 persons
without written permission by the department; (h) enter or remain upon the area for any
purposes whatsoever between the period one-half hour after sunset to one-half
hour before sunrise without written permission of the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
102.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
